entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort Nelson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:08 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Nelson Airport 11:28 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -18.4°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow except showers over southern sections this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind light except southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
